question: The "Fehmarn Belt Fixed Link Project" is a proposed tunnel project connecting which two countries?
explanation: Fehmarn Belt Fixed Link is a proposed tunnel project connecting the FehmarnÂ  Island of Germany and Lolland Island of Denmark, which will be constructed across the Fehmarn Belt of the Baltic Sea. This project will further extend its connection to Copenhagen, the capital f Denmark, located in the Zealand Islands, thereby becoming the world's longest road and rail tunnel project facilitating an easy and fast connection between Central Europe and Scandinavia.
